attributes.additional_details: Matt Hancock is becoming far to self-important. The actions being taken due to covid are becoming more Matt Hancock's way with total disregard to other ministers and experts views. His course of action is to achieve another national lockdown regardless of the consequences for businesses or peoples right to freedom. He needs to removed from is position.
attributes.background: Matt Hancock needs to be removed from is position before he does irreparable damage to the UK economy.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
